headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WIGOD, ROBERT MAYNARD

snippet: WIGOD--Robert Maynard, on July 21, 2016 in his 84th year. Eternally mourned by his wife Suzy (Dorothy), his son Dewey and his daughter Cantor Emily Wigod Pincus and son-in-law Drew, his grandson Nathaniel and his step-grandchildren Alexie and Ben,...
lead_paragraph: WIGOD--Robert Maynard, on July 21, 2016 in his 84th year. Eternally mourned by his wife Suzy (Dorothy), his son Dewey and his daughter Cantor Emily Wigod Pincus and son-in-law Drew, his grandson Nathaniel and his step-grandchildren Alexie and Ben, his sister Alice Howard (Hal) and his sister-in-law Dr. Judith Jacobson and brother-in-law Leon I. Jacobson. Service Monday, July 25, 1:30pm at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81st St. 1/3
